title: Cranberry and oatmeal cookies
ingredients: ['240g butter, melted', '180g light brown soft sugar', '180g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground cinnamon (be generous)', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '240g plain flour', '225g dried cranberries', '130g rolled oats']
